snippet: Twenty-two people were killed in two days of fighting between Houthi rebels and government-allied tribesmen in northern Yemen, tribal and local sources said.
abstract: Twenty-two people are killed during two days of fighting between Houthi rebels and government-allied tribesmen in northern Yemen; Houthis claim victory in taking over large areas of Jawf Province, while tribesmen say they performed a tactical withdrawal.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-two people were killed in two days of fighting between Houthi rebels and government-allied tribesmen in northern Yemen, tribal and local sources said.

headline.main: Yemen: 22 Are Killed in Clashes in the North
headline.print_headline: Yemen: 22 Are Killed in Clashes in the North
